  "Broker Comment" : "[CUSTOMER] NEVER PURSUED THE COMPLAINT AND SIGNED A RELEASE OF ALL CLAIMS.  MR. LORD VIGOROUSLY DENIES THE ALLEGATION. CLIENT RECEIVED FREQUENT COMMUNICATIONS FROM LORD & LEGG MASON, INCLUDING A MARKET LETTER, NEWS RELEASES, TRADE CONFIRMATIONS & MONTHLY STATEMENTS.  CUSTOMER COMPLAINT IS PRIMARILY DUE TO THEIR INVESTMENT IN NATIONAL INTERGROUP (LATER FOXMEYER, LATER AVATEX).  THIS SECURITY MET CUSTOMER'S STATED INVESTMENT OBJECTIVES OF LONG-TERM GROWTH & INCOME OVER A PERIOD OF YEARS BEFORE SUFFERING STEEP DECLIEN DUE TO MARKET FORCES & CONDITIONS BEYOND LORD'S OR LEGG MASON'S CONTROL. AVATEX IS NOW THE SUBJECT OF PENDING CLASS ACTION ASSERTING MATERIAL MISREPRESENTATIONS & OMISSIONS BY THE ISSUER."
}
